```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
```

Let's load the AirBnB dataset.

```{r}
data("nyc_airbnb")

nyc_airbnb =
  nyc_airbnb |> 
  mutate(
    rating = review_scores_location / 2
  ) |> 
  select(
    neighbourhood_group, rating, price, room_type, lat, long
  ) |> 
  filter(
    neighbourhood_group == "Manhattan",
    room_type == "Entire home/apt",
    price <= 500,
    price >= 100
  )
```

Let's make an interactive scatterplot.

```{r}
nyc_airbnb |> 
  mutate(
    label = str_c("Price: $", price, "\nRating: ", rating)
  ) |> 
  plot_ly(
    x = ~lat, y = ~long, color = ~price,
    text = ~label, 
    type = "scatter", mode = "markers"
  )
```
